website_summaries.verdict: Compact and fast, the Transcend ESD200 is an excellent storage and backup extension for your USB 3.0-enabled laptop.
pros: The Transcend ESD200 portable SSD is supercompact and superfast
cons: The drive's capacity caps at just 256GB, and its bundled software is useless

customer_reviews.title: flimsy, now loose use port that constantly disconnects
customer_reviews.text: the drive itself is ok but the usb port does not hold the very short usb cable and it constantly comes off and interrupts transfers. It makes it basically unusable. Disappointed.... Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MaBe

customer_reviews.title: This is a good deal on a small solid state hard drive
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal on a small solid state hard drive. Made it much easier moving old files to a new computer. And you can backup and store stuff on this just to have a small backup to grab when fleeing your house fire (ha, ha!).
customer_reviews.author: Chacodog

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 TIMES AFTER THAT DIDN'T WORK ANY MORE VERY BAD
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS USED 3 - 4 TIMES AFTER THAT DIDN'T WORK ANY MORE VERY BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great for Virtual Machines
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these now in my department that we are using with VMware Workstation VMs. They are pretty snappy as a portable drive to store and run your VM from. There is noticeable difference when firing up VMs from the Transcend SSD vs conventional drives (and we have conventional USB 3 drives from server vendors). We'll see it how holds up in the long run - but thus far I really like it. I do like the original case style better than the new all black one. I have the original design, my coworker the newer style.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Failed in 90 days
customer_reviews.text: Drive was hinky from the start. Hard to get to format, Windows 8 didn't want to recognize. Finally got it formatted and the tunes copied to play in my Tesla. Sometimes wouldn't be recognized in there and had to unplug and replug. At 90 days, failed totally. Drive is recognized by OS, but can't be read or formatted. Cute little thing, with promise. Just needs to be more reliable - maybe a firmware problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. H. Schatzlein

customer_reviews.title: Great SSD drive, although pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice drive, it's very compact and is very fast. It is a bit pricey in my opinion, but it's nice to know it won't crash like my external magnetic drives have done. So many that I have owned over the years failed within a 3-5 year period. Prices of these SSDs should continue to fall.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Super Drive
customer_reviews.text: Very fast drive. Works great for interacting with VMware. Also great with file transfers on USB 2.0 devices. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Failed within 90 days - DON'T BUY THIS!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two - one for a backup drive and one to store photos. the backup drive failed in under 90 days! biggest P.O.S. out there. I'd rate this a Zero if I could.....
customer_reviews.author: Paul Masucci

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: This drive is really fast and I use it as my main storage device now. I use my other drives for backup
customer_reviews.author: Florin Bejinaru

customer_reviews.title: Has limitations.....
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly read the product features when I bought this 128GB as a backup for my desktop "work" computer. It turns out that you don't realize until you load the software that this solid state drive will NOT backup Windows files, nor will it backup any other files larger than 4GB. it seems like a nice product, but one that i cannot use for the purpose that I intended to use it for. It's too bad, but I will have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: collyman

customer_reviews.title: USB 3.0
customer_reviews.text: It's convenient and compact. However, it isn't as fast as I expected it to be on a USB 3.0 connection.
customer_reviews.author: RM

product_meta.title: Transcend Information 128GB SuperSpeed 2.5-Inch USB 3.0 External Solid State Drive 260/225 MB/s TS128GESD200K
product_meta.description:
Capacity:128 GB

Featuring a next-generation SuperSpeed USB 3.0 connection interface, the ESD200 USB 3.0 Portable Solid State Drive is perfect for those demanding high-speed data transfer. The ESD200’s lightweight, compact design and solid state durability make it ideal for storing, protecting, carrying and sharing all your digital files wherever you go.

INCREDIBLE ULTRA HIGH SPEEDS
The ESD200 portable hard drive is equipped with the next-generation SuperSpeed USB 3.0 interface that provides 10 times the bandwidth of USB 2.0. Thanks to its use of USB 3.0, the ESD200 makes file sharing easier and quicker than ever with real-world transfer speeds of up to 260MB/s.

AT A GLANCE:
 * Shockproof design yet lightweight & easy-to-carry
 * Available in 128GB &256GB capacities
 * USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 connection options
 * LED power/data transfer activity indicator
 * Includes free download of Transcend Elite data management software

The ESD200 is much smaller and lighter than conventional portable hard drives THE PERFECT BALANCE OF STRENGTH AND STYLE
Taking full advantage of solid-state storage technology, the ESD200 runs cool and silent, and can withstand excessive shock and vibration. About the size of a credit card, the ESD200 is ultra light and easy to carry, and includes a handy travel pouch to protect the drive’s sleek outer case against scratches during transport.

STORAGE TO MEET YOUR NEEDS
Available in 128GB and 256GB capacities, the ESD200 can carry your entire collection of movies, music, documents, eBooks, and photos – all in the palm of your hand. Each 256GB drive can store a full 112 hours of DVD footage, over 4,000 hours of digital music, or 120,000+ high resolution digital images.

SIMPLE FILE MANAGEMENT
Using the ESD200 on your computer couldn’t be easier. Simply connect the drive to a SuperSpeed USB 3.0 port and drag and drop desired files to and from the device. The ESD200 supports Microsoft Windows 8/7/Vista/XP, Mac OS X, and Linux systems, and is backwards compatible with USB 2.0 ports.

TRANSCEND ELITE DATA MANAGEMENT SOFTWARE INCLUDED
For added value, the ESD200 includes a free download of the exclusive Transcend Elite data management tools that help you manage data and increase productivity. With this convenient software, you can easily perform incremental backups, compress files with 256-bit AES Encryption, and much more.

ONE TOUCH AUTO BACKUP BUTTON
One-touch synchronization and backup The ESD200 is equipped with an extremely convenient One Touch auto-backup button for instant data backup and synchronization when used with Transcend Elite software.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX
ESD200 Portable Solid State Drive, Quick Start Guide, USB 3.0 Cable, Warranty Card.

STORAGE CHART
Photos Music Video File Type JPG1 MP32 DVD3 128GB 62,464 photos 32,000 songs 56 hours 256GB 124,928 photos 64,000 songs 112 hours 1 Based on 2MB file size. 
2 Based on 4min per song, 128Kbps quality. 
3 Based on 2.25GB per hour DVD quality. Storage capacity approximations are for general reference only. Actual results will vary depending on resolution, compression quality, video frame rate/interlace settings, and content. 1GB = 1 billion bytes. A certain portion of the storage capacity may be reserved for firmware and maintenance use. 
*Note: speed may vary depending on the device and usage of hardware or software.
feature_bullets: SuperSpeed USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 connection options. Maximum R/W Performance up to 260/225 MB/s
Connection bandwidth up to 5Gbits per second
Dual-color LED indicator (power, data transfer & USB 2.0/3.0 connection type)
Sleek ultra portable design. Easy Plug and Play operation, no drivers required
USB powered, no external adapter necessary
Includes Transcend Elite data management software
